pkgmetadata.longdescription: # [apkg docs online][upstream-docs]## [apkg docs on Read the Docs][docs]## [apkg docs on GitLab](https://gitlab.nic.cz/packaging/apkg/-/blob/master/docs/README.md)## apkg docs offlineSee docs/index.md and other files in docs/ directory.You can also render docs into HTML using mkdocs: pip install -r doc-requirements.txt mkdocs build browser site/index.html#### read the [docs] and have a nice packaging ᕕ( ᐛ )ᕗ[docs]: https://apkg.rtfd.io[upstream-docs]: https://pkg.labs.nic.cz/pages/apkg
